entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
